workflow.name: Generate high-quality audio with Voxtral Small 24B 2507
workflow.description:
# Generate High-Quality Audio with Voxtral Small 24B 2507

This workflow integrates the **notdaniel/voxtral-small-24b-2507** model from Replicate to generate audio content from provided inputs. It handles API authentication, creates predictions, polls until completion, and outputs the final generated audio file.

---

## ‚ö° Section 1: Trigger & Authentication

* **üîò On clicking 'execute'** ‚Üí Manually starts the workflow.
* **üîë Set API Key** ‚Üí Stores your Replicate API key to authenticate requests.

**Benefit:** Securely connects your workflow to Replicate‚Äôs API and ensures only authorized requests are made.

---

## üéõÔ∏è Section 2: Create Prediction

* **üåê Create Prediction** ‚Üí Sends a request to Replicate‚Äôs API with parameters like:

  * **audio**: Input audio file (e.g., a reference sample).
  * **max\_new\_tokens**: Maximum number of tokens to generate (controls audio length/complexity).

**Benefit:** Starts the audio generation process with configurable input and settings.

---

## ‚è≥ Section 3: Polling & Status Tracking

* **üÜî Extract Prediction ID** ‚Üí Captures the unique prediction ID and endpoint for polling.
* **‚è±Ô∏è Wait** ‚Üí Pauses for 2 seconds before re-checking.
* **üì° Check Prediction Status** ‚Üí Polls Replicate‚Äôs API to see if the audio generation is done.
* **‚úÖ Check If Complete** ‚Üí

  * If finished: moves forward to process results.
  * If not: loops back to wait and check again.

**Benefit:** Efficiently manages asynchronous audio generation, ensuring the workflow only proceeds when results are ready.

---

## üéß Section 4: Process Result

* **üìù Process Result** ‚Üí Extracts and structures final output data:

  * **status** (success or failure)
  * **output** (raw response)
  * **metrics** (generation statistics)
  * **timestamps** (created and completed times)
  * **audio\_url** (final generated audio link)

**Benefit:** Provides a clean, structured output that can be used in follow-up automations (e.g., sending audio to users, storing in a database, or sharing via email).

---

## üìä Workflow Overview

| Section                     | Purpose                         | Key Nodes                                                               | Benefit                          |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| ‚ö° Trigger & Authentication  | Start workflow & authenticate   | Manual Trigger, Set API Key                                             | Secure execution                 |
| üéõÔ∏è Create Prediction       | Submit audio generation request | Create Prediction                                                       | Start model processing           |
| ‚è≥ Polling & Status Tracking | Monitor prediction progress     | Extract Prediction ID, Wait, Check Prediction Status, Check If Complete | Ensures reliable completion      |
| üéß Process Result           | Format and deliver output       | Process Result                                                          | Clean audio result ready for use |

---

## ‚úÖ Final Benefits

* üîí Secure authentication with Replicate
* üéõÔ∏è Flexible audio generation using **voxtral-small-24b-2507**
* ‚è≥ Reliable polling until results are ready
* üéß Clean and structured audio output

---

            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE

    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:

   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
